common_1290_hakase_24a:
To think that you would manage to defy even
the original professor’s final protections![npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_24b:
To think that you would manage to defy even
the original professor’s final protections![npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_25a:
Yes... A completely unforeseen outcome, even
for an AI possessing the most sophisticated\r
technology ever conceived.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_25b:
Yes... A completely unforeseen outcome, even
for an AI possessing the most sophisticated\r
technology ever conceived.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_26a:
Even on the brink of despair, you children did
not give in and instead proved your worthiness:\r
showing the wisdom to think for yourselves,\r
the courage to hold faith in your friends,\r
and the fortitude to do what had to be done.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_26b:
Even on the brink of despair, you children did
not give in and instead proved your worthiness:\r
showing the wisdom to think for yourselves,\r
the courage to hold faith in your friends,\r
and the fortitude to do what had to be done.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_27a:
No matter how difficult your own pasts may
have been...[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_27b:
No matter how challenging of a future may
await you...[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_28a:
I believe you will be capable of walking whatever
paths you choose for yourselves now. With pride.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_28b:
I believe you will be capable of walking whatever
paths you choose for yourselves now. With pride.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_01a:
[BD06:0]I thank you, [trnm:0]. I thank
all\r
of\r
you children.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_01b:
[BD06:0]I thank you, [trnm:0]. I thank
all\r
of\r
you children.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_02a:
But I am afraid that the time machine cannot be
put to a complete stop so long as I am here.\c
It appears I myself am part of the system that
ensures the machine reboots when stopped.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_02b:
But I am afraid that the time machine cannot be
put to a complete stop so long as I am here.\c
It appears I myself am part of the system that
ensures the machine reboots when stopped.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_04a:
You know, when I was watching you all on your
adventures from down here, I felt a sense of...\r
jealousy.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_04b:
You know, when I was watching you all on your
adventures from down here, I felt a sense of...\r
jealousy.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_06a:
The way that you came together, working in
league with your fellows and caring for them...[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_06b:
The way that you came together, working in
league with your fellows and caring for them...[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_07a:
The way that you sought strength and to better
yourself, throwing all you are into your battles...[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_07b:
The way that you sought strength and to better
yourself, throwing all you are into your battles...[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_08a:
The way that you would face down even the
greatest enemies to save that which you loved...[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_08b:
The way that you would face down even the
greatest enemies to save that which you loved...[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_09a:
The way that you never ceased to seek—nor to
fight for—a treasure all your own...[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_09b:
The way that you never ceased to seek—nor to
fight for—a treasure all your own...[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_10a:
Ah, and the way that you soared free through
the very skies on those wings of yours.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_10b:
Ah, and the way that you soared free through
the very skies on those wings of yours.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_11a:
I wish that I, too, might be as free as you all—
free to seek out that which I might treasure\r
above all else. Not...bound.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_11b:
I wish that I, too, might be as free as you all—
free to seek out that which I might treasure\r
above all else. Not...bound.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_12a:
As long as I remain here, the time machine will
not stop—for I am inextricably connected to it.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_12b:
As long as I remain here, the time machine will
not stop—for I am inextricably connected to it.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_13a:
So I’ve made a decision.\c
I will use the time machine to journey to the
world of the ancient past that I have dreamed of.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_13b:
So I’ve made a decision.\c
I will use the time machine to journey to the
world of the future that I have dreamed of.[npcn:F]
common_1290_rival_01:
What?! You can’t just leave now—right when we
finally reached you![npcn:4]
common_1290_hakase_14a:
I am not going only so that the time machine can
be stopped.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_14b:
I am not going only so that the time machine can
be stopped.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_15a:
I also cannot deny my desire to see that ancient
world for myself.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_15b:
I also cannot deny my desire to see that future
world for myself.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_16a:
Is this what it feels like to have your heart race
with the thrill of adventure...?[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_16b:
Is this what it feels like to have your heart race
with the thrill of adventure...?[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_18a:
Arven. I am sorry that I kept the truth from you
for so long.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_18b:
Arven. I am sorry that I kept the truth from you
for so long.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_19a:
I inherited all the thoughts and wishes of the
professor, and so I understand better than any...[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_19b:
I inherited all the thoughts and wishes of the
professor, and so I understand better than any...[npcn:F]
common_1290_friend_03: You can’t just go and say a thing like that now![npcn:6]
common_1290_hakase_21a: No? I suppose you’re right. I am sorry.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_21b: No? I suppose you’re right. I am sorry.[npcn:F]
common_1290_hakase_22a:
[BD06:0]Arven. Koraidon. [trnm:0]. It is
a\r
little\r
sad,\r
but\r
I’m\r
afraid\r
this\r
is\r
good-bye.[npcn:C]
common_1290_hakase_22b:
[BD06:0]Arven. Miraidon. [trnm:0]. It is
a\r
little\r
sad,\r
but\r
I’m\r
afraid\r
this\r
is\r
good-bye.[npcn:F]
